title.rendered: Secret Calculator Apps vs Cover: Hiding Explicit Photos

content.rendered:
What’s better for hiding photos? A secret calculator app or Cover? Both have their pros, but in this article, we’ll discuss everything you need to know before you install a dedicated photo & video vault of your own.  

Secret Calculator Apps

Secret and hidden calculator apps are good for getting the job done. They’re a basic way to hide any explicit content on your Android device. 

These apps do exactly what they’re advertised to do and sound exactly how they function. Hidden calculator apps are simply a photo vault app disguised as a calculator! Here are a few pros:

  • Disguised: The calculator disguise of the app icon is a surefire way to make sure no one snoops around your device. Easy as that!
  • Password Protected: Photo apps disguised as calculators are great because the password can be typed right in the calculator! Most apps allow standard 4-digit numerical passcodes.

These apps get the job done and are great for anyone looking for a quick solution to hide photos!

Cover

Cover is an all-in-one solution for all of your private photo & video needs. While developing Cover, we made sure to pack the app with a ton of amazing features that make the app a one-stop-shop for all of your photo privacy needs.

Cover has just about every single security feature and will ensure no explicit content is ever “publicly” on your device. 

Here are the features that set Cover apart from secret calculator apps: 

  • Real-time Protection: What makes Cover unique is it’s Real-time Protection. With this feature, your device will constantly be on the lookout for explicit content. Once it’s detected, it will automatically be moved to your private vault.
  • Smart Notifications: Whenever explicit content is caught by Cover’s AI, you’ll be subtly notified. It’s discreet notifications make it the perfect photo vault to use, especially if you find yourself surrounded by many people everyday.
  • Messaging Blocking: In addition to being a photo vault, Cover also monitors your messages for any incoming explicit photos. The app will block any nude photos or videos that are sent to you.
  • Password Protected: Cover is passcode protected like most calculator apps, but it goes the extra step by offering a fingerprint password!
  • Encrypted: Cover is end-to-end encrypted. Meaning the only person who can view your content – is you. 

Download Cover Today!

Cover is the superior photo & video vault app that you need installed on your Android phone or tablet. The private and secure photo gallery is available on the Google Play store for free.
